title: Over the River and Through the Wood: A Thanksgiving Poem
description: "Recalling a simpler time, this book captures the poem's sense of excitement and celebration. Readers who join the family en route to Grandfather's house will observe many details about life in the 19th century... Manson's woodcuts, painted in the colors of a snowy evening, lovingly depict the wintry countryside". --School Library Journal. Full-color illustrations.
author: Lydia Maria Child
